summary: The MkDocs AI update introduces advanced AI summary capabilities, supporting multiple AI services like DeepSeek and OpenAI. It offers language-specific summaries, content cleaning, and automatic local summaries when AI services are unavailable. The update includes adaptive environment configuration, robust caching, and flexible options for folder and page-level control. Technical features encompass unified API integration, error handling, and display optimizations. Planned features include multi-AI support, secure API key management, and batch processing mode.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
